00019 #include "DataGroupWriter.h"
00020 #include "DataGroupHeaderWriter.h"
00021 #include "FileWriteException.h"
00022 
00023 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_io;
00024 
00025 DataGroupWriter::DataGroupWriter(std::ofstream* o, DataGroupHeader* p) 
00026 {
00027         os = o;
00028         dataGroupHdr = p;
00029         CreateWriters();
00030 }
00031 DataGroupWriter::~DataGroupWriter() 
00032 { 
00033         writers.clear();
00034 }
00035 
00036 void DataGroupWriter::WriteHeader()
00037 {
00038         dataGroupHdrWriter.Write(*os, *dataGroupHdr);
00039         u_int32_t currentPos = os->tellp();
00040         dataGroupHdrWriter.UpdateDataSetPos(*os, currentPos);
00041 }
00042 
00043 void DataGroupWriter::Close() const
00044 {
00045         u_int32_t currentPos = os->tellp();
00046         dataGroupHdrWriter.UpdateNextDataGroupPos(*os, currentPos);
00047 }
00048 
00049 void DataGroupWriter::GetDataSetWriters(DataSetWriterIt &begin, DataSetWriterIt &end)
00050 {
00051         begin = writers.begin();
00052         end = writers.end();
00053 }
00054 
00055 DataSetWriter& DataGroupWriter::GetDataSetWriter(int32_t index)
00056 {
00057         return writers[index];
00058 }
00059 
00060 int32_t DataGroupWriter::GetDataSetWriterCnt() const
00061 {
00062         return (int32_t)writers.size();
00063 }
00064 
00065 void DataGroupWriter::CreateWriters()
00066 {
00067         int sz = dataGroupHdr->GetDataSetCnt();
00068         for(int i = 0; i < sz; i++)
00069         {
00070                 DataSetWriter* p = CreateDataSetWriter(dataGroupHdr->GetDataSet(i));
00071                 writers.push_back(*p);
00072                 delete p;
00073         }
00074 }
00075 
00076 DataSetWriter* DataGroupWriter::CreateDataSetWriter(DataSetHeader& hdr)
00077 {
00078         return new DataSetWriter(os, &hdr);
00079 }
00080 
00081 std::wstring DataGroupWriter::GetDataGroupName() const
00082 {
00083         return dataGroupHdr->GetName();
00084 }
00085 
00086 void DataGroupWriter::UpdateNextDataGroupPos() const
00087 {
00088         u_int32_t currentPos = os->tellp();
00089         dataGroupHdrWriter.UpdateNextDataGroupPos(*os, currentPos);
00090 }
